name: Nessy the Rilla - 1000 Words - Produced by The Usual Suspects

attributes.trait_type: 1000 Words - Produced by The Usual Suspects

metadata.description:
I wrote this in the wake of being in a state where I had so much to talk about, but couldn't put it into words.

As I touched down at NFT NYC '23, I linked up Smartz from The Usual Suspects + The Pigeons of New York NFT out at The Multiverse Studios. It had been a long day with a lot of road blocks, and I just wanted to vent. Within 30 minutes, Smartz cooked up the perfect vibe for me to just let it all out.

"A Thousand Words" is simply a testament + reminder to anyone out there struggling to feel like they are enough. Sometimes, we just have to let go + trust the things that aren't in our control will workout for our better good.

Follow Us on Social Media:
@nessytherilla
@smartzworld

Written by Nessy the Rilla
Produced, Recorded, Mixed + Mastered by "Smartz" of The Usual Suspects at The Multiverse Studios - East Orange, NJ

lyrics.text:
Hook:
Gotta-lot-to-Say, just don’t-Know-How-to-Say-it
Life-a work-of-Art-i-Master-Pieces-tryna-Frame-it
Sojourner-of-this-Earth-Spreading-the-Truth-cuz-I-aint-Staying-sh*t
Nothing-Last-forever-Pray-you-Savor-This, Time-to-Bring-some

Flavor-In, Whippin-In-the-Kitchen-bangin-Sisters-call-me
Clark cuz-im-Blessed-and-highly-Favored-Yea, Scrollin-Through-my
Phone, look-at-All-the-Checks-i-Gave-the-Twins, Present-In-the
Past, but-my-Futures-what-i-Make-of-It

Verse:

i-Don’t-have

Time-to-watch-the-Bleacher-Report, im-In-the-Game-bro
Glad-you-Know-that-We-are-not-the-Same-Yo, do-it-For-the
Mothers-of-my-Brothers-Eternally-in-a-Slumber-Victims
Of-the-Scripted-System-not-in-Vain-though, Crazy-how-they

Lie-like-They-dont-See-Us…eventhough-deep-Down-in
Side-they-Wanna-Be-us-Steal-the-Spice-like-Paprika-i
Been-a-Teacher, Class-Clown-in-them-Dungarees-i
Been-a-Leader, catch-me-on-Twitter-and-Follow-Me 

.Grew-up-in-Churches-giving-Worship-praying-Hallowed-Be

..no-Mistake-that-i-Made-it-she-Say-she-Proud-of-Me
Shawty-is-my-Place-of-Refuge-when-she-Bow-and-Swallow-These

Arrangements-of-Cadences, Head-got-my-Brain-Blasting

They-gon-always-Talk-what-they-Want, I-Learn-to-Savor-it
Prove-em-All-Wrong-through-The-Songs, only-Play-to-Win 

Verse 2:

Pull-Off-in-the-Lambo-top-Down so-the-Haters-See

Hope-my-Papa-Proud gotta-Show-em-He-still-Made-a-G
I-was-in-that-Focus-feelin-Hopeless-I-could-Take-the-Lead
Then-I-Did-that-Show-and-Had-a-Couple-Thousand-Chasin-Me

Turnt-it-To-a-Business-Want-my-Service-gotta-Pay-the-Fee
Cant-build-Generational-Wealth If-you-dont-Lay-the-Crete
….for
All-our-Days-of-Walkin-and-Starvin-They-gonna-Skate-and-Eat
Lookin-Back-where-i-Started-it-really-Melt-my-Soul
Lotta-n*ggas-called-the-Flow-Garbage, Yet-it-Felt-like-Gold
Wish-my-City-wasnt-so-Bitter-i-Planned-to-Help-you-Bro
I-cant-even-Be-Mad-At-em, the-Hands-we-Dealt-is-Cold
